#Comp 410: Data Structures and Algorithms
Dr. David Stotts

###Office
FB 144
TTH 13h-14h30
919.590.6133

**help-comp410@cs.unc.edu** for course questions/help

Class site: [www.cs.unc.edu/~stotts/COMP410-s17/](www.cs.unc.edu/~stotts/COMP410-s17/)
HW on Calendar, Assignments page
Submit via Sakai
Exam: Star Wars day at 12h

###Code
Programming in Java (n'importe quel IDE)
Typical assignment: implement data structure; main method tests data structure
"Oracle" test suites on SAKAI
When zipping, include everything (except the specific test.java files)
